thread.title: Haywood dismissed from UNCW men's hoops
thread.title_full: Haywood dismissed from UNCW men's hoops

author: WECT Staff
title: Haywood dismissed from UNCW men's hoops
text:
Haywood dismissed from UNCW men's hoops Posted: WILMINGTON, NC (WECT) - 
Jarvis Haywood was dismissed from the UNCW men's basketball program Wednesday. 
According to a news release, the 6-4, 185-pound Junior guard out of Charlotte, was recently suspended for violating team rules. 
"Jarvis did not comply with the team rules and standards we have for our basketball program," UNCW Head Coach Kevin Keatts said of the Jacksonville University transfer. "We wish him well in the future." 
Haywood, and fellow Junior C.J. Gettys, did not make the August trip to the Bahamas with the rest of the men's hoops team after failing to meet team expectations in the preseason. 
Haywood transferred to UNCW last year and was forced to sit out the 2014-2015 basketball season due to NCAA rules. He never played in a game for the Seahawks.
